casebody.data:
[Cite as 03/22/2004 Case Announcements, 2004-Ohio-1326.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

March 22, 2004

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-1161. State v. Crotts.

Cuyahoga App. No. 81477, 2003-Ohio-2473. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County.

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that this cause be remanded to the court of appeals for appointment of new counsel and that new counsel be permitted to brief and argue this case.

IT IS FURTHER ORDERED by the court that appointed counsel shall file a copy of the court of appeals’ entry of appointment with the Clerk of this court.
